Package ui.popups

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CheatsPopup
    The CheatsPopup is a pop up window that displays a list of available cheats and allows for toggling of those cheats on and off
    ContainerPopup
    The ContainerPoup displays the contents of a container, and allows the user to select and take items out of the container our put them in.
    ControlsPopup
    The ControlsPopup displays a list of the commands that the user can use and the keys mapped to those commands
    InputPopup
    The Input popup is responsible for getting and passing the inputs from the user to the client including name, IP address of the desired server and the team of the player
    LoadPopup
    The load popup displays a dialog for loading a saved game, and prompts the user to select a file
    RightClickListener
    The RightClickListener is responsible for listening to mouse inputs on the inventory panel and selecting the clicked item or launching the right click menu
    RightClickMenu
    The RightClickMenu launches a right-click pop-up and passes the selected action to the client
